mapper.sql: TIME, STATUS, COMMAND_ID, CARRIER_ID, ORIGINATOR, PRIORITY, REPLACE, ATOMIC_REQ_TIME, ATOMIC_ANS_TIME, ATOMIC_INI_TIME, ATOMIC_ACQ_TIME, ATOMIC_CMP_TIME, TSC_ID, SRC_LOC, DST_LOC, ABORT_COMMAND_ID, ABORT_CARRIER_ID, ABORT_ORIGINATOR, ABORT_REQ_TIME, ABORT_ANS_TIME, ABORT_INI_TIME, ABORT_CMP_TIME, ABORT_REASON, ROUTE_NO, VEHICLE_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ATOMIC_TRANSFER_LOG
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ATOMIC_TRANSFER_LOG (TIME, STATUS, COMMAND_ID, CARRIER_ID, ORIGINATOR, PRIORITY, REPLACE, ATOMIC_REQ_TIME, ATOMIC_ANS_TIME, ATOMIC_INI_TIME, ATOMIC_ACQ_TIME, ATOMIC_CMP_TIME, TSC_ID, SRC_LOC, DST_LOC, ABORT_COMMAND_ID, ABORT_CARRIER_ID, ABORT_ORIGINATOR, ABORT_REQ_TIME, ABORT_ANS_TIME, ABORT_INI_TIME, ABORT_CMP_TIME, ABORT_REASON, ROUTE_NO, VEHICLE_ID) values (#{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{commandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{replace,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{atomicReqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{atomicAnsTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{atomicIniTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{atomicAcqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{atomicCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{srcLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dstLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abortCommandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abortCarrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abortOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abortReqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abortAnsTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abortIniTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abortCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abortReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routeNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update ATOMIC_TRANSFER_LOG
TIME = #{record.time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMMAND_ID = #{record.commandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARRIER_ID = #{record.carrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGINATOR = #{record.originator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIORITY = #{record.priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPLACE = #{record.replace,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATOMIC_REQ_TIME = #{record.atomicReqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATOMIC_ANS_TIME = #{record.atomicAnsTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATOMIC_INI_TIME = #{record.atomicIniTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATOMIC_ACQ_TIME = #{record.atomicAcqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATOMIC_CMP_TIME = #{record.atomicCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TSC_ID = #{record.tscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SRC_LOC = #{record.srcLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DST_LOC = #{record.dstLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABORT_COMMAND_ID = #{record.abortCommandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABORT_CARRIER_ID = #{record.abortCarrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABORT_ORIGINATOR = #{record.abortOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABORT_REQ_TIME = #{record.abortReqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABORT_ANS_TIME = #{record.abortAnsTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABORT_INI_TIME = #{record.abortIniTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABORT_CMP_TIME = #{record.abortCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABORT_REASON = #{record.abortReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROUTE_NO = #{record.routeNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VEHICLE_ID = #{record.vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ATOMIC_TRANSFER_LOG set TIME = #{record.time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMMAND_ID = #{record.commandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARRIER_ID = #{record.carrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINATOR = #{record.originator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIORITY = #{record.priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPLACE = #{record.replace,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATOMIC_REQ_TIME = #{record.atomicReqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATOMIC_ANS_TIME = #{record.atomicAnsTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATOMIC_INI_TIME = #{record.atomicIniTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATOMIC_ACQ_TIME = #{record.atomicAcqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATOMIC_CMP_TIME = #{record.atomicCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TSC_ID = #{record.tscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SRC_LOC = #{record.srcLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DST_LOC = #{record.dstLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABORT_COMMAND_ID = #{record.abortCommandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABORT_CARRIER_ID = #{record.abortCarrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABORT_ORIGINATOR = #{record.abortOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABORT_REQ_TIME = #{record.abortReqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABORT_ANS_TIME = #{record.abortAnsTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABORT_INI_TIME = #{record.abortIniTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABORT_CMP_TIME = #{record.abortCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABORT_REASON = #{record.abortReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROUTE_NO = #{record.routeNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VEHICLE_ID = #{record.vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ATOMIC_TRANSFER_LOG
CARRIER_ID = #{carrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGINATOR = #{originator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPLACE = #{replace,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATOMIC_REQ_TIME = #{atomicReqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATOMIC_ANS_TIME = #{atomicAnsTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATOMIC_INI_TIME = #{atomicIniTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATOMIC_ACQ_TIME = #{atomicAcqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATOMIC_CMP_TIME = #{atomicCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TSC_ID = #{tscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SRC_LOC = #{srcLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DST_LOC = #{dstLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABORT_COMMAND_ID = #{abortCommandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABORT_CARRIER_ID = #{abortCarrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABORT_ORIGINATOR = #{abortOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABORT_REQ_TIME = #{abortReqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABORT_ANS_TIME = #{abortAnsTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABORT_INI_TIME = #{abortIniTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABORT_CMP_TIME = #{abortCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABORT_REASON = #{abortReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROUTE_NO = #{routeNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VEHICLE_ID = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TIME = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and COMMAND_ID = #{commandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ATOMIC_TRANSFER_LOG set CARRIER_ID = #{carrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINATOR = #{originator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPLACE = #{replace,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATOMIC_REQ_TIME = #{atomicReqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATOMIC_ANS_TIME = #{atomicAnsTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATOMIC_INI_TIME = #{atomicIniTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATOMIC_ACQ_TIME = #{atomicAcqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATOMIC_CMP_TIME = #{atomicCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TSC_ID = #{tscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SRC_LOC = #{srcLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DST_LOC = #{dstLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABORT_COMMAND_ID = #{abortCommandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABORT_CARRIER_ID = #{abortCarrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABORT_ORIGINATOR = #{abortOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABORT_REQ_TIME = #{abortReqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABORT_ANS_TIME = #{abortAnsTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABORT_INI_TIME = #{abortIniTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABORT_CMP_TIME = #{abortCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABORT_REASON = #{abortReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROUTE_NO = #{routeNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VEHICLE_ID = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TIME = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and COMMAND_ID = #{commandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM( SELECT 0 num, time, carrier_id, (select tsc_abbreviation from tsc where tsc.tsc_id = atomic_transfer_log.tsc_id) tsc_abbreviation, src_loc, dst_loc, ( CASE status WHEN 0 THEN 'Complete' WHEN 1 THEN 'Cancel' ELSE TO_CHAR(status) END ) statusStr, priority, route_no, ROUND( ( ( TO_DATE( SUBSTR( atomic_ini_time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) - TO_DATE( SUBSTR( atomic_req_time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) ) * 24 * 3600 ), 0 ) queued_Time, ROUND( ( ( TO_DATE( SUBSTR( time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) - TO_DATE( SUBSTR( atomic_ini_time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) ) * 24 * 3600 ), 0 ) lead_Time, ROUND( ( ( TO_DATE( SUBSTR( time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) - TO_DATE( SUBSTR( atomic_req_time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) ) * 24 * 3600 ), 0 ) total_Time, vehicle_id, command_id, atomic_req_time, atomic_ans_time, atomic_ini_time, atomic_acq_time, atomic_cmp_time, abort_req_time, abort_ans_time, abort_ini_time, abort_cmp_time, abort_reason FROM atomic_transfer_log
ORDER BY time, carrier_id )

SELECT rownum, time, carrier_id, tsc_abbreviation, src_loc, dst_loc, statusStr, priority, route_no, queued_Time, lead_Time, total_Time, vehicle_id, command_id, atomic_req_time, atomic_ans_time, atomic_ini_time, atomic_acq_time, atomic_cmp_time, abort_req_time, abort_ans_time, abort_ini_time, abort_cmp_time, abort_reason FROM( SELECT row_number() over(order by time, carrier_id) rn, rownum, time, carrier_id, (select tsc_abbreviation from tsc where tsc.tsc_id = atomic_transfer_log.tsc_id) tsc_abbreviation, src_loc, dst_loc, ( CASE status WHEN 0 THEN 'Complete' WHEN 1 THEN 'Cancel' ELSE TO_CHAR(status) END ) statusStr, priority, route_no, ROUND( ( ( TO_DATE( SUBSTR( atomic_ini_time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) - TO_DATE( SUBSTR( atomic_req_time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) ) * 24 * 3600 ), 0 ) queued_Time, ROUND( ( ( TO_DATE( SUBSTR( time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) - TO_DATE( SUBSTR( atomic_ini_time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) ) * 24 * 3600 ), 0 ) lead_Time, ROUND( ( ( TO_DATE( SUBSTR( time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) - TO_DATE( SUBSTR( atomic_req_time, 1, 14 ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) ) * 24 * 3600 ), 0 ) total_Time, vehicle_id, command_id, atomic_req_time, atomic_ans_time, atomic_ini_time, atomic_acq_time, atomic_cmp_time, abort_req_time, abort_ans_time, abort_ini_time, abort_cmp_time, abort_reason FROM atomic_transfer_log
ORDER BY time, carrier_id )
SELECT tsc_abbreviation, tsc_id, tsc_type, exec_sid, llc_sid FROM tsc WHERE tsc_type IS NOT NULL AND tsc_type <> 'PORTC' ORDER BY 1
SELECT tsc_abbreviation, tsc_id, tsc_type FROM tsc WHERE tsc_type IN ( 'CDC', 'OCDC','XCDC','STC') ORDER BY 1
SELECT ohb_id, ohb_id, 'OHB' FROM ohb ORDER BY 1
SELECT port_abbreviation, port_id, 'PORT' FROM port ORDER BY 1
